abstract: CBS’s line-up of mostly repeats edged past Fox for the most viewers on Tuesday, even as Fox easily led the night among adults 18 to 49. Fox broadcast the top two shows in that demographic, “The Moment of Truth” at 8 p.m. and “Hell’s Kitchen” at 9 p.m., which also delivered the night’s single largest audience, 9.3 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: CBS’s line-up of mostly repeats edged past Fox for the most viewers on Tuesday, even as Fox easily led the night among adults 18 to 49. Fox broadcast the top two shows in that demographic, “The Moment of Truth” at 8 p.m. and “Hell’s Kitchen” at 9 p.m., which also delivered the night’s single largest audience, 9.3 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Without ‘Idol,” Fox Loses a Tuesday to CBS
